ratawala sarthaka lesa bawitha wana kramawedayaki..meya sankalpiya lesa gathahoth wenasma aakarayaki..enam dan men siyalla druda thatiwala obaganime kramawedayak methula natha..walakul lesa chithranaya karanu labana wiwidha bhauthika sthanawala athi daththa gabada mangin labaganna daththa matha padanam wu kramayakata methula kriyakarakam siddha we..mehidi skayip web brawsara men kuda pramanaye mrudukanga kotasak pamanak pariganakaya thula sthapanaya karanu labana athara anekuth boho de jalaya haraha sidu weyi..apa sarala udaharanayak gamu api ee mela yawanawita akuru wisala kirimata sakasimata simitha awasthawak apita labe ee haraha ee melaya haraha yawanu labana akuru wenas kala haka..meya apita itha sarala lipi sakasum kramayak lesa bawitha kala haka..gugal doks namin me aakaraye ..lipi sakasum kramawedayak krayathmaka weyi..ee haraha antharjalaya harahama wadasatahana kriyathmaka wana athara ekama lipiya dahas ganakata ekawara labagatha haki lesada sakasiya haka..awasi nam ema lipiya sew kara thabiya haka..oba loke kothanaka sitiyath obata tharamak wegawath antharjala pahasukama athnam oba nawathuwu than sita lipiya sakasiya haka..danata opis pak eka thulathi boho de saralawama me gugal doks(

eya awith wimasa wiwrutha kara bala thama thamage prathyaksha gnyanayenma piligatha yuthuya”(eehi passiko – oopa nayiko)anguththara nikaye aththakara suthraye sandahan karunu nathahoth iganwim maginda pudgalaya swa shakthiyen yukthawa swadhinawa katayuthu karana bawa pahadili we.udaharana – anthakara – thaman karanu labana kriya parakara – anun karanu labana kriya aarambhakadhathu - kriyawak aarambha kirima nikkama dhathu– kriyawa aarambha kirima sandaha alasa kamin nikmima parakkama dhathu– wiryaya pawathwagena yama thama dhathu– wiryaya balawath wima tithi dhathu – sthawara wiryayakata paminima upakkama dhathu - kriyawa sarthaka kara ganimata upakrama yedimamema karunu walin pahadili wanne budu samaya thula pudgala shakthiya ha swadhinathwaya agaya karana iganwim handunwa di athi bawayi.

idiriyedi thawath kalathmaka gayaka gayikawange prasanga pamanak noweyi jathyanthara piliganimak athi gayaka gayikawange prasanga sanwidhanaya kirimatath salasum kara thibenawa.amaradewa prasangaya sanwidhanaya karanne lakshman hulugalla widihata mamath star iwent wenuwen sudharma neththikumara mahathmiyath sanwidhanaya karanne.star iwent kiyanne merata wishalama prasangaya sanwidhanaya kala aayathanaya widihata kala kshethraye kirthi namayak dinagena thibenawa.pashchath yuda samaye di merata kalawath sahithyayath mona widihe thaththwayakatada pathwa thibenne?pashchath yuda samayakadi ratak yatha thaththwayata pathwimata dirgha kalayak yanawa.
